name: The Time is Right
description:
Title: The Time is Right

Platform: HTML

Genre: Text Adventure

Game Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 12+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

Embark on an adventure through time where your choices determine the outcome of the game. Explore either the past or present to learn about the culture of both time periods. Replay for multiple endings that tie together so you can understand the full story

Instructions: Play through your browser

Game Design Team

Noah Ralston – Game Designer
